column14: effect=Deals 30 HP damage to the target Pokémon and any Pokémon behind it in a 2-by-2 diamond-shaped pattern.
column15: descsmd=Waving it at a Pokémon causes blasts on and around that Pokémon. It damages nearby Pokémon

column14: descsmd=Waving it at a Pokémon makes that Pokémon confused. When the Pokémon is confused
column15: it attacks or uses a move in the wrong direction.

column13: effect=Locates the stairs on the floor.
column14: descsmd=Waving it reveals the way to the stairs.

column13: effect=Swaps the user's and target's current HP values. Always fails against bosses.
column14: descsmd=Waving at a Pokémon swaps the HP of you and that Pokémon.
descsmd=Waving it at a Pokémon makes that Pokémon petrified. When the Pokémon is petrified
column15: it cannot do anything until something else happens to it.
column16: descmdrtdx=Waving it at a Pokémon makes that Pokémon Petrified. This effect continues until it takes damage.

column13: effect=Transports the user to the tile directly in front of the Pokémon or wall hit by the projectile
column14: then warps teammates to the user.
column15: descsmd=Waving it at a Pokémon or a wall makes you jump at it. It also warps and draws your teammates to you.

column14: effect=Cuts the target's HP to 25%.<!--unsure of "of current" or "of max"
column16: descsmd=Waving at a Pokémon cuts that Pokémon's HP to 1/4.

column14: descsmd=Waving it at a Pokémon reduces that Pokémon's Travel Speed.
column15: descmdrtdx=Waving it at a Pokémon reduces that Pokémon's Travel Speed for a while.

column14: descsmd=Waving it at a Pokémon makes that Pokémon sleep. During sleep
column16: descmdrtdx=Waving it at a Pokémon makes that Pokémon Sleep for a while.

column13: effect=Warps a Pokémon to a random room on the floor and makes it petrified.
column14: descsmd=Waving it at a Pokémon warps the Pokémon somewhere and makes it petrified.
descsmd=Waving it at a Pokémon warps teammates to that Pokémon.

column13: effect=Switches places with a Pokémon. If you switch places with an enemy Pokémon
column14: it attracts your teammates near you
column15: but it can't attract stray teammates.
column16: descsmd=Waving it at a Pokémon makes you switch places with that Pokémon. If you switch places with an enemy Pokémon
column17: it attracts your teammates near you
column18: but it can't attract stray teammates.

column15: descsmd=Waving it at a Pokémon changes that Pokémon's Ability to {{a|Truant}}
column16: and the Pokémon won't do anything after using a move. But being near the Pokémon may induce yawning

column13: effect=If the wand targets a destructible wall
column14: a straight line of up to 10 wall tiles are turned into floor tiles. If the wand targets a Pokémon
column16: descsmd=Waving it at a wall makes the wall crumble. If you wave it at a Pokémon

column14: but also reduces the user's HP to 50% of its maximum<!--
column16: descsmd=Waving it at a Pokémon always reduces that Pokémon's HP to 1. But it also reduces your own HP to half of its maximum.

column13: effect=Randomly warps a Pokémon and Pokémon near it somewhere on the floor.
column14: descsmd=Waving it at a Pokémon warps that Pokémon and Pokémon near it somewhere on the floor.
causing damage if it hits a wall or another Pokémon
column15: descsmd=Waving it at a Pokémon knocks that Pokémon flying. The Pokémon takes damage if it hits a wall or another Pokémon.
